window

Class Subwindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • window.Subwindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Subwindow>, Clickable, IActionHandler, ILowLevelController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiagramSubwindow, DialogBox

    public abstract class Subwindow
extends java.lang.Object
implements Clickable, ILowLevelController, java.lang.Comparable<Subwindow>, IActionHandler
    abstract superclass for all subwindows
